docs.title: Summary
docs.text: Hi, this is Taskeren, who is also known as 楓 (Kaede in Japanese), or 倪钍 (NiTu in Chinese).

docs.title: Games
docs.text:
• Destiny 2 (deeply experienced player, over 7k hours)
  • Minecraft (like heavily mod'ed modpack, currently playing GTNH)
  • League of Legends (was the favorite game, until I found that I am not good at MOBA at all)
  • OPUS series (by Sigono, the favorite story games!)
  • PUBG
  • GTA VC/V

docs.title: Languages
docs.text:
• 100% Simplified Chinese and 99% Traditional Chinese
  • 40% English
  • 10% Japanese

docs.title: Want to Know More?
docs.text: Ask in the new issue, and if I'd like to let you know, I'll reply.

docs.title: Minecraft Mods/Plugins
docs.text:
My favorite programming region, because I learned it from this.

  • MineQuery (for MC 1.17 and later): a Minecraft mod provides many features mostly for survival mode.
  • MineQuery (for MC 1.16): deprecated.
  • ElytraMining (for MC 1.7.10): a Minecraft mod backports the Hammers from Thermal series.
  • ElytraServers/NotEnoughElements (for MC 1.7.10): a Minecraft mod provides NEI search filter of Element in the item, depends on GregTech5U.

docs.title: Java/Kotlin Libraries
docs.text:
• TConfig: an extracted legacy Forge configuration system.
  • ElytraServers/BrigadierX: a library provides many extension methods for Brigadier by Mojang, like DSL.
  • ForgedVersion: an extracted Forge versioning system.

docs.title: Articles
docs.text:
• ThisMightBeUsefulForMacNewbies: gives tips for new Mac users.
  • ForK-GFW: a fork of FuckGFW, re-organized the document. Deprecated.

docs.title: Dyfused Comittee
docs.text:
An organization providing online service for dead rhythm game Dynamite.

  • Dyfused/ExplodeX: the backend server implementation for Dynamite.
  • Dyfused/Explode-Kotlin: deprecated legacy impl.
